rsuite-plugin.description: Contributes foundational DITA Open Toolkit plugins, including DITA for Publishers (1.0.0RC09), doctype declarations for Word to DITA and DITA to InCopy conversion configuration, and RSuite ID attribute declarations.

moDef.name: conversion_configuration
moDef.displayNameXPath: if (*[contains(@class, ' topic/title ')]) then *[contains(@class, ' topic/title ')] else if (@title) then string(@title) else '{No title found}'
